TopicTitle: How do I solve the restore windows error?!!

Articles.Content: I've been using KSP for about a year now, and was really excited to download the new update. I played it once, then the next day, I opened it and it said: "KSP wants to restore windows" and whatever option I choose results in the game not responding. Someone please help me!

This is the wrong forum for these kinds of issues. You'd have more luck asking here, assuming you're not using mods: Support (unmodded installs)

See the corresponding forum for if you are using mods. You could also wait for a mod to move the thread, but that could take quite a long time. Never mind, looks like either you got lucky, or the mods are paying close attention today

Be sure to read the known issues/self help thread and the bug reporting guide - both are stickied.

Edited December 22, 2014 by armagheddonsgw

You're on an Apple Mac aren't you? Only Macs do this, it's a Mac created problem due to how they work and nothing to do with KSP.

Try to close KSP down properly from the main menu and you should avoid this, otherwise you'll have to find the saved state for KSP and delete it, the support stickies will tell you how to do this.

Where are the support stickies you may wonder, why, at the top of the forum area I just moved this too
